main event: Approximately 20 spheroid or disc-shaped objects were observed flying in formation over Fielding Lake, Alaska on 9 July 1948.
interesting points: The objects were seen moving in excess of 500 MPH at approximately 5,000 ft., The formation of the objects resembled a 'shotgun blast pattern', A loud roaring sound was heard which sharpened into a buzzing noise, There were no visible exhaust trails from the objects, The sighting lasted for about 5 seconds.
